LanguageData.RT_M113M_APC.label: M113(M) APC
LanguageData.RT_M113M_APC.description: A mortar variant of the M113 APC, capable of both infantry transport and artillery support; common to see in foreign military trade worldwide. Armed with a 120 mm self-propelled mortar and a 7.62 mm machine gun.
